conbody.p: This chapter informs you how to get a project up and running.

You can set up a project from the beginning:
Create a new project
Edit the project settings
Create the folder structure
Define roles
Update access rights
Add users and send an invitation mail.

As an alternative, you can create a copy of an existing project and select the options you want to copy to the new project.Only the project administrator can create a new project, or copy an existing project.A customer can have multiple project administrators, managed by our support team.
